result.execSummary:
The defendant Ryan J Raether was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Lewd, Lascivious Behavior-Exposure, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 944.20(1)(b).
  • Contribute/Delinquency Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.40(2).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: to modify judgment of conviction
PETITION FOR PAYMENT OF COURT APPOINTED ATTORNEY FEES
STIPULATION AND ORDER TO MODIFY CONDTIONS OF PROBATION
victim impact statement

Defendant Ryan J Raether in court with attorney Phillip Stamman.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14CF71 & 14CM59 tracking together:
Atty Hendee moves to amend the information in 14CF71; Ct. 1 to Lewd & Lascivious Behavior 944.20, Ct. 2 to Contributing to the Delinquency of a Minor 948.40(4) and adding Ct. 3 Disorderly Conduct 947.01(1).  On 14CM59, the State moves to add a Ct. 2 Disorderly Conduct 947.01(1).    Atty Hendee states plea agreement to all five (5) charges.  Atty Stamman agrees and enters a No Contest plea.  Defendant agrees.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.  Atty Hendee relies on the criminal complaint for a factual basis.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty of Counts 1, 2 & 3 in 14CF71 and Counts 1 & 2 in 14CM59.

  State has complied with victim notification requirements.
Atty Hendee makes sentencing recommendations.
Atty Stamman makes sentencing arguments.

BY THE COURT:  14CF71 - Amended Ct. 1, Amended Ct. 2 and Ct. 3 and 14CM59 - Ct. 1 and Ct. 2:
Withhold Sentence; 3 years Probation with conditions:
Court Costs = $243.00 on each of the five (5) counts
No contact with the victim unless it is authorized by the Agent
Restitution = $7,598.93; joint and several with Mark Kuester, 14CM58
Establish a payment schedule with the Agent
Court orders 75 days in the Marquette County Jail w/huber on Ct. 1 in 14CF71
  Report on or before July 17, 2015 by 7:00pm, clean & sober.
May transfer to Dane County
Electronic Monitoring
Credit = 0 

Clerk to pay out Restitution as it is paid into COC office.


**5/22/15:  Per DA's office, 14CF71 Ct 2 should be amended to 948.40(2).  smr

bond continued.  Arraignment scheduled for May 20, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Ryan J Raether in court with attorney Phillip Stamman.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14CF71 & 14CM59:
Atty Hendee states that in speaking with Atty Stamman; the defendant will be waiving the Prelim on 14CF71.  Atty Stamman agrees and has discussed the waiver with his client.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and this defendant committed it.  Case bound over for trial or further proceedings.

Atty Hendee files the information with the court.

  Defendant received a copy of the information & waives it's reading.

with conditions:
*No contact with victim dob 5/31/1998
*Appear for booking today

Defendant Ryan J Raether in court with attorney Phillip Stamman.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14CM59 & 14CF71:
  Atty Hendee states that bond needs to be set along with booking in 14CF71.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint in 14CF71 & waives it's reading.  Atty Stamman is making a special appearance today on this case.  Defendant has not come up with the money to retain him yet.  Atty Stamman asks that 14CM59 track with 14CF71.  Atty Hendee does not object to a signature bond with conditions.
Atty Stamman requests a signature bond and does not object to the no contact.

BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $500 Signature bond with conditions:
*No contact with victim dob 5/31/1998
*Appear for booking today

Atty Stamman states that the defendant waives time limits for the Prelim on 14CF71.
BY THE COURT:  Time limits waived.  Set for Prelim.
14CM59 will track with 14CF71.
Atty Hendee will get with Atty Stammon for a pre-trial date.  Return date scheduled for November 13, 2014 at 03:30 pm.
